items.details:
Reading 

Complete 172-173 in my view book.

The story this week is 'Living in Deserts' 

Please watch the video until you understand the story.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NxDlziHeNdg 

The spelling words for Next Thursday are:

shield
lack
exposure
nomadic
landscape
extreme
drowned
heatstroke
protect
conditions
traditional 
climate
oasis
barren
pollution 

I have assigned a story on What Lives in the Deserts? (DUE LAST FRIDAY)
I have assigned a story on 

Learning About the Sun  DUE THIS THURSDAY)
Please try your best to complete these assignments to help your reading grow!  Please answer every question and SUBMIT.

 Go to www.readworks.org/student 

Enter our class code YU6GQ2
Your password is 1234 unless you already changed it

Math

Complete Additional Practice 4-1

Please have your child practice a little Khan Academy math each night at https://www.khanacademy.org/join/VK6QDS9E to help strengthen their skills.

Science

Watch the video to understand the lesson today.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Dx3RpXdJw2k

Study for the test in the next class.
